prompt: Photorealistic close-up of a collection of antique silver spoons, tarnished with age, arranged on a dark, textured wooden surface. Focus on the intricate details of the spoon bowls and handles, showcasing different patterns and styles. Soft, diffused lighting from a window highlights the textures and imperfections. Shallow depth of field, emphasizing one spoon in the foreground. Macro photography style, capturing the minute details of the silverwork. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.1
name: old-spoons-identifier-image-1.png

prompt: A brightly lit antique dealer's workbench, cluttered with tools, polishing cloths, and a magnifying glass. A partially cleaned antique silver spoon lies under the magnifying glass, revealing hallmarks. The background features shelves filled with various antique silverware items. Professional product photography style, with a clean, organized chaos. Natural daylight pouring in from a large window. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 5.1
name: old-spoons-identifier-image-2.png

prompt: A side-by-side comparison of three antique spoons representing different eras (e.g., Georgian, Victorian, Art Deco). Each spoon is placed on a neutral grey background, individually lit to highlight its unique features and design elements. Include subtle labels indicating the era of each spoon. Clean, minimalist photography style. High-resolution, sharp focus. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.2
name: old-spoons-identifier-image-3.png

prompt: Overhead shot of an open antique book about silverware. The book is lying flat on a dark wooden table. An antique silver spoon is placed on top of the open pages, pointing to a diagram illustrating different spoon hallmarks. The scene is lit with warm, inviting light, creating a sense of history and discovery. The background is slightly blurred to focus on the book and spoon. --ar 16:9 --style raw --chaos 10
name: old-spoons-identifier-image-4.png

prompt: A dramatic, low-angle shot of a silversmith's hand holding an antique silver spoon. The silversmith is using a polishing cloth to gently clean the spoon. Sparks fly from a nearby workbench where another spoon is being worked on. The background is a dimly lit workshop filled with tools and equipment. High contrast lighting to emphasize the silversmith's skill and the beauty of the spoon. Cinematic, documentary photography style. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.3
name: old-spoons-identifier-image-5.png
